mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_wishlist( customer_id, hotel_id, create_Date, update_Date ) VALUES( #{customerId}, #{hotelId}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT h.hotel_name, h.hotel_content, rw.create_date, rw.update_date FROM room_wishlist rw inner join hotel h ON rw.hotel_id = h.hotel_id where customer_id = #{customerId} limit #{beginRow}, #{ROW_PER_PAGE}
